com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service

Class AlchemyService

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.WatsonService
      • com.ibm.watson.developer_cloud.service.AlchemyService
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AlchemyDataNews, AlchemyLanguage, AlchemyVision

    public abstract class AlchemyService
extends WatsonService
    Abstract class which has functionality for the different Alchemy services.
